title: 11/18/2020 - HOUR 1 - Durant, NBA draft, Tua, Harbaugh
itunes:title: 11/18/2020 - HOUR 1 - Durant, NBA draft, Tua, Harbaugh
description:
Kevin Durant needs to do what it takes to get James Harden to the Nets

The problem with this NBA draft

There's a reason why Tua thinks the NFL is easier than he thought

Colin defends Jim Harbaugh


Guest: Nick Wright
